column4: Latest;P------hnom Penh: The------ body of a baby boy was found thrown onto a garbage pile at about 9 pm on November 3
column9: Russey Keo District.------Sources from the scene
column10: said a resident took the garbage out near the fence of the Wat  and found the dead newborn baby wrapped in white cloth in the rubbish.------Local authorities came down and took the baby to be buried in Toul Sangke pagoda. ------TDN------UPDATE: Later reports suggest the baby was possibly stillborn
